title: Inconsistency in URL rewriting with custom session tracking cookie name
description: Chapter 7.1.1 of servlet30finalspec.pdf states that a custom name for session tracking cookies should affect the URL parameter when URL rewriting is enabled. However, the observed behavior contradicts this specification.
OB: Upon accessing the page using the provided war file (cookiename.war), the cookie 'MYSESSIONCOOKIE' is set with a value of '658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F' under Path '/cookiename'. Despite this, when clicking the 'Reload' link on the page, the URL shows 'jsessionid' instead of the expected custom session cookie name.
EB: Expected behavior should reflect the specification: the URL parameter should use the custom session tracking cookie name ('MYSESSIONCOOKIE') instead of 'jsessionid' when URL rewriting is enabled.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Deploy the provided 'cookiename.war' file. 2. Access 'http://localhost:8080/cookiename/'.
